column1: Contact your health care provider and do NOT treat yourself if: - You have a lot eye pain or sensitivity to light - Your vision is decreased - You have red or painful eyes - You have flaking, discharge, or a sore on your eye or eyelid - You have had trauma to your eye, or you have a bulging eye or a drooping eyelid - Your dry eyes do not get better with self-care measures within a few days If you have been hammering, grinding, or could have come in contact with metal fragments, do NOT attempt any removal.
